articles.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
articles.description: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press
articles.author: Morgan Little

articles.title: Wearable health devices could generate a million tons of e-waste by 2050
articles.description: The most surprising part is that the plastic isn't the biggest problem.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: A viral Reddit post alleging fraud from a food delivery app turned out to be AI-generated
articles.description: When fake content goes viral, the damage has already been done, even if the post is debunked.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Mobileye acquires humanoid robot startup Mentee Robotics for $900M
articles.description: Mentee Robotics was co-founded by Mobileye president Amnon Shashua.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: xAI says it raised $20B in Series E funding
articles.description: Nvidia is among the many investors, but xAI has not disclosed if these investments come in the form of equity or debt.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: California lawmaker proposes a four-year ban on AI chatbots in kids’ toys
articles.description: “Our children cannot be used as lab rats for Big Tech to experiment on,” Senator Steve Padilla said. He just introduced a bill to ban AI chatbots in
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: The most bizarre tech announced so far at CES 2026
articles.description: From an AI panda pet to an anime girl hologram for your desk, here are the wildest products at CES 2026.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Intel is building a handheld gaming platform including a dedicated chip
articles.description: Intel has been building chips designed for gaming PCs for years but the company is now moving into handheld devices too.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: LMArena lands $1.7B valuation four months after launching its product
articles.description: LMArena, which started as a UC Berkeley research project, has raised about $250 million total and become a unicorn in about seven months.
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Founder of spyware maker pcTattletale pleads guilty to hacking and advertising surveillance software
articles.description: Bryan Fleming, the founder of hacked stalkerware company pcTattletale, pleaded guilty to federal charges linked to the running of his now-defunct
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: How World Cup champion Mario Götze built a parallel career as an angel investor
articles.description: Companion M, Götze’s personal investment vehicle, now has a portfolio of more than 70 companies, two of which became unicorns in 2025
articles.author: Anna Heim

articles.title: Threads is developing in-message games
articles.description: Launching in-message games would give Threads an edge over competitors like X and Bluesky, which don’t offer built-in games.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems installs reactor magnet, lands deal with Nvidia
articles.description: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Meta pauses international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses
articles.description: Meta had originally planned to launch the glasses in France, Italy, Canada, and the U.K. in early 2026.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Amazon’s Ring doorbells get fire alerts, an app store, and new sensors
articles.description: The new Ring Sensors can detect motion, openings, glass breakage, and smoke, and can also monitor carbon monoxide levels, leaks, temperature changes,
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Narwal adds AI to its vacuum cleaners to monitor pets and find jewelry
articles.description: Narwal's new robo vacuum cleaner switches to quiet mode near a baby's crib.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES
articles.description: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
